transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Ha. Ji ha, Nihal ji, very good afternoon.
Customer: Good afternoon.
Executive: Sir, main Amit baat kar raha tha India Marted office mein tha sir Vikas bol raha tha sir. Ayushi ke senior head baat kar raha tha sir. Actual mein abhi aapka kuch kuch discussion hua tha sir. Uske baad aapne feedback diya hua tha not satisfied ka. Main jaan sakta hu kya dikkat aa rahi hai aapko sir?
Customer: Nahi, inka nahi diya. Iske pehle wala jo tha na apna IRC uske andar ye madam ko.
Executive: Nahi sir lekin ye lekin madam ke liye diya hai na aapka wo feedback to.
Customer: Na na uske pehle wale mein diya tha. Madam ke liye to satisfied diya hai dekho na.
Executive: Nahi sir aapne not satisfied diya hai. To wo concern raise hua tha.
Customer: The yaar.
Executive: To aapne kaha unhi ke liye matlab aap dekho na sir ye feedback given by the whatsapp. Whatsapp ke through aapne feedback diya hai.
Customer: Ha madam ka to sahi tha review sara.
Executive: To koi dikkat problem to nahi hai na sir abhi?
Customer: Nahi nahi nahi nahi koi nahi.
Executive: To main ye concern close kar deta hu uske liye ek bar aapke pass feedback jayega to please aap usme satisfied kar dijiyega wo unke liye.
Customer: Are maine uske liye kiya tha wo jo iske pehle ka tha na apna.
Executive: Ha ha. Chaliye koi baat nahi sir. But please aapse request hai abhi ek bar aapke pass feedback jayega to usse aap satisfied kar dijiyega.
Customer: Ha ha ha.
Executive: Thik hai sir? Aur wo unko bolna jara calling ka issue hai wo solve kar de.
Customer: Thik hai hum fir na video meeting mein ek bar aur again baat kar lenge. Main unko Ayushi ko bhi samjha deta hu kaise baat karna hai aapke liye kahan pe. Thik hai?
Executive: Okay okay thik hai.
Executive: To abhi feedback aayega sir please wo Ayushi ke liye aap usko yes kar dijiyega. Satisfied kar dunga okay. Ha.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer received a call despite a negative feedback.

- Customer wants the calling issue to be resolved.



Resolution:

- Executive clarified the feedback was for previous call.

- Executive requested customer to provide positive feedback.

- Executive assured to resolve calling issue.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- feedback, calling issue, satisfaction
